ns:common.topic.description: Lego Logo was a version of the Logo computer programming language which could manipulate robotic Lego bricks attached to a computer. It was implemented on the Apple II computing platform and was used in American and other grade schools in the late 1980s and early 1990s.\nLego Logo was a precursor to LEGO Mindstorms.
rdfs:label: Lego Logo

ns:common.document.text: Lego Logo was a version of the Logo computer programming language which could manipulate robotic Lego bricks attached to a computer. It was implemented on the Apple II computing platform and was used in American and other grade schools in the late 1980s and early 1990s. \nLego Logo was a precursor to LEGO Mindstorms.
